snippet.title: My Monsters - Meta Quest Announcement Trailer - Hand-Painted VR Action-Adventure
snippet.description:
We are very excited to share with you the announcement trailer for My Monsters!

My Monsters is a VR action-adventure game that stands out for its 100% hand-painted art. The game’s deep narrative explores humanity’s greatest inner monsters, such as anxiety, fear, and loneliness, as players are transported to the dream-like world of Onirium, where they meet Moti, a frightened little monster with no memory. Team up with your inner monster, Moti, to face enemies, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges side by side, uncovering fragments of a meaningful dreamlike tale.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/JbjaPMYv4Y

https://linktr.ee/playmymonsters
